document_data.name: Nornglast
document_data.mainbody: '''Nornglast''' was the smallest of the "Royal Keeps" of [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Background: Nornglast was a place haunted by spirits. An typical Eskornar saying was "Nornglast is ruled by ghosts." This saying was closer to truth, because Nornglast was the main "principality" of the [[Eminence of Araunt]].
document_data.History:
The town was named after its founders, [[Clan Nornglast]].

Around five hundred years before the [[Spellplague]], the [[bone naga]] [[Lod]] founded the Eminence of Araunt in the catacombs of Nornglast.
document_data.Notable inhabitants: * Lod, the bone naga and founder of the Eminence of Araunt.
